launcher.startScript: (cd ~/jenkins-utils && git pull git@github.com:sifive/jenkins-utils.git) && \ AGENT_NAME=SLURM.FPGA.VCU118.SW.03 \ JENKINS_AGENT_SLURM_CLUSTER=testbed \ JENKINS_AGENT_SLURM_PARTITION=boardtest \ JENKINS_AGENT_MEM=6GB \ JENKINS_AGENT_CPUS_PER_TASK=4 \ JENKINS_AGENT_SLURM_CONSTRAINT="testboard_vcu118_taiwansd|testboard_vcu118_nosd" \ JENKINS_AGENT_SALLOC_ACCOUNT=sw \ JNLP_SECRET=7750a032767d1389ae55e0f4854f6b6858af5081f935012ae2562dbad75ba24c \ JENKINS_URL=https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/ \ ~/jenkins-utils/tools/jenkins-agent-salloc-tiny.sh
